mapper.insert:
insert into fund_gs (fundcode,name,type,gszzl,gzdate,gztime,updated_time) values
(#{item.fundcode},#{item.name},#{item.type},#{item.gszzl},#{item.gzdate},#{item.gztime},#{item.updatedTime})
on duplicate key update fundcode = VALUES (fundcode), gzdate = VALUES (gzdate), name = VALUES(name), type = VALUES(type), gszzl = VALUES(gszzl), gztime = VALUES (gztime), updated_time = VALUES (updated_time)
